Class RegionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.impl.RegionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeContainer, ContentObject, Region, RegionContainer, GeometricObject, org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvertRegion, ChartRegion, ChemRegion, FrameRegion, GraphicRegion, ImageRegion, LineDrawingRegion, MathsRegion, MusicRegion, NoiseRegion, SeparatorRegion, TableRegion, TextRegion

    public abstract class RegionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Region
    Basic implementation for layout regions.

    clc
